frontmatter.dek: In which the author itemizes the cameras he uses to make photographs

content:
## Camera Setup

- 56mm f1.2

- 23mm f2

### N90s

### Olympus XA 2

### Black & White Film

### Appendix

#### Video settings

When shooting video:

- f-log
- 24fps
- 1080p
- 4k used sparingly for large shots, to crop/zoom later
- 4:3 ratio (????)

When creating animations

- 4k
- 12fps or 24fps
